title: 1 Bedroom in Torrance | Fridge | Spa/Hot Tub | Shimmering Pool | Gym
map_address: Anza Avenue near Del Amo Blvd.
posting_body: ['Unit Availability: August 23, 2022', 'Seville Townhouse is in a convenient location in Torrance, California, that puts you just minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment.', 'When you are ready to go, the beach and Del Amo Fashion Mall are only minutes away!', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Laundry Facilities', '- On-Site Management', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Spa/Hot Tub', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- Easy Access to Freeways and Shopping', '- Ten Minutes to the Beach', '- Sauna', '- 5 Minutes From Anza Mall', '- Elevator', '- Covered Parking*', '- Pool', '- Sundeck with BBQ Area', 'Apartment Amenities', '- Two Closets*', '- Refrigerator', '- Wood Plank Floors*', '- Gas Range', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances*', '- Mirrored Closet Doors', '- Air Conditioning', '- Disposal', '*With Select Apartment Homes.', 'Price & availability are subject to change.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Square footage may not be exact.', 'Interior Photos may not be on exact unit.']
